page.title: 01HOUSING
page.content: {Dringhouses is a residential area where many of the houses are provided by York City Council. A number of residents have bought their houses and this part of York compares with Woodthorpe in that the residents in Dringhouses tend not to move as much as those in Woodthorpe. There are many instances where three generations live in the area of Dringhouses. {Woodthorpe residents form a changing population. They move from place to place because of their employment with British Rail. Many young married people with growing families tend to buy larger houses in the area and so leave room for newly married couples.New houses are being built all the time and so more and more people are coming into the Woodthorpe area.
